CustomField.description: If an Assignment is associated with a Milestone, Timecards logged for that Assignment will, by default, also be associated with the Milestone on the Assignment at the time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If an Assignment is associated with a Milestone, Timecards logged for that Assignment will, by default, also be associated with the Milestone on the Assignment at the time.
CustomField.label: Milestone

lookupFilter.infoMessage: Only milestones for the same project are shown. To display all milestones, click Show all results.
